mapper.insert: insert into t_meal_info (mark_id, theme, base_price, sale_price, stock_size, server_status, description, sort,meal_no) values (#{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{basePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{stockSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{serverStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{mealNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_meal_info
mark_id,
theme,
base_price,
sale_price,
stock_size,
server_status,
description,
sort,
meal_no,
#{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{basePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
#{stockSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{serverStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
#{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{mealNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_meal_info
theme = #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
base_price = #{basePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
stock_size = #{stockSize,jdbcType=INTEGER},
server_status = #{serverStatus,jdbcType=BIT},
description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER},
meal_no = #{mealNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_meal_info set theme = #{theme,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, base_price = #{basePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, sale_price = #{salePrice,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, stock_size = #{stockSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}, server_status = #{serverStatus,jdbcType=BIT}, description = #{description,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sort = #{sort,jdbcType=INTEGER}, meal_no = #{mealNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where mark_id = #{markId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT m.mark_id AS goodsId,m.theme AS goodsName,m.description, (SELECT image_path FROM t_meal_image WHERE meal_id=m.mark_id AND server_type=0 limit 1) AS goodImage, m.sale_price AS salePrice , IF(s.promotion_mode IS NULL,m.sale_price, CASE WHEN s.promotion_mode=0 THEN m.sale_price-s.price WHEN s.promotion_mode=1 THEN m.sale_price * s.discount END) AS specialPrice, c.image_path AS iconPath, 2 AS productType FROM t_label_goods l LEFT JOIN t_meal_info m ON l.goods_id=m.mark_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT s.promotion_mode,s.price,s.discount,i.goods_id FROM t_special_info s LEFT JOIN t_special_item i ON s.mark_id=i.special_id WHERE s.server_status=1 AND s.promotion_type=1 AND (CASE WHEN s.start_time IS NOT NULL THEN s.start_time < NOW() ELSE 1=1 END) AND (CASE WHEN s.end_time IS NOT NULL THEN s.end_time > NOW() ELSE 1=1 END)) s ON m.mark_id=s.goods_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT i.image_path, t.goods_id FROM t_icon_info i LEFT JOIN t_icon_item t ON i.mark_id=t.icon_id WHERE i.server_status=1 AND t.mark_id IS NOT NULL) c ON m.mark_id=c.goods_id WHERE l.label_id=#{labelId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND l.server_status=1 AND m.mark_id IS NOT NULL AND m.server_status=1 AND m.server_status=1 ORDER BY l.sort

SELECT m.mark_id AS goodsId,m.theme AS goodsName,m.description,c.content,m.sale_price AS basePice, IF(s.promotion_mode IS NULL,m.sale_price, CASE WHEN s.promotion_mode=0 THEN m.sale_price-s.price WHEN s.promotion_mode=1 THEN m.sale_price * s.discount END) AS salePrice, c.image_path AS iconPath, 2 AS productType, (SELECT SUM(j.star)/SUM(5) FROM t_meal_judge j WHERE j.meal_id=m.mark_id GROUP BY j.meal_id) AS praise FROM t_meal_info m LEFT JOIN t_meal_content c ON m.mark_id=c.meal_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT s.promotion_mode,s.price,s.discount,i.goods_id FROM t_special_info s LEFT JOIN t_special_item i ON s.mark_id=i.special_id WHERE s.server_status=1 AND s.promotion_type=1 AND (CASE WHEN s.start_time IS NOT NULL THEN s.start_time < NOW() ELSE 1=1 END) AND (CASE WHEN s.end_time IS NOT NULL THEN s.end_time > NOW() ELSE 1=1 END)) s ON m.mark_id=s.goods_id LEFT JOIN (SELECT i.image_path, t.goods_id FROM t_icon_info i LEFT JOIN t_icon_item t ON i.mark_id=t.icon_id WHERE i.server_status=1 AND t.mark_id IS NOT NULL) c ON m.mark_id=c.goods_id WHERE m.mark_id=#{mealId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
